content: cheese coaster designed by crochetcrafters1 © 2025 crochetcrafters1 - all rights reserved this pattern and its contents are only for personal use do not copy edit redistribute or sell this pattern you are welcome to sell finished products with your own photos in small quantities but if you do so please give pattern credit to crochetcrafters1 thank you and enjoy stitches and abbreviations - this pattern is written in us terminology st/sts stitch/stitches chain chain half_double_crochet double_crochet tools and materials - 5 mm crochet hook - bernat premium #4 worsted medium - yellow - yarn needle - scissors final size - width 10 cm technical notes *at the end of each row is a stitch count in brackets *stitch count does not include chains *link to the youtube video is at the bottom of the pattern cheese/coaster yellow row 1 chain 15 start in the second chain from the hook make 1 half_double_crochet in each chain across 14 sts row 2 chain 1 turn make 1 half_double_crochet in each of the first 2 sts chain 2 skip 2 sts and then make 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 6 sts finally make 1 half_double_crochet inv decrease 9 sts row 3 chain 1 turn make 1 half_double_crochet in each of the first 2 sts chain 2 skip 2 sts and then make 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 3 sts then make 2 half_double_crochet into the hole you made from the previous row finally make 1 half_double_crochet in each of the last 2 sts 9 sts row 4 chain 1 turn make 1 half_double_crochet in each of the first 7 sts then make 2 half_double_crochet into the hole you made from the previous row make 1 half_double_crochet in the next st then in the last st make 2 half_double_crochet finally chain 3 12 sts row 5 chain 1 turn start in the second chain from the hook make 1 half_double_crochet in each of the 2 chs then make 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 5 sts chain 2 skip 2 sts and then make 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 5 sts 12 sts row 6 chain 1 turn make 1 half_double_crochet in each of the first 5 sts then make 2 half_double_crochet into the hole you made from the previous row finally make 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 7 sts 14 sts row 7 chain 1 turn make 1 half_double_crochet in the first st chain 2 skip 2 sts and then make 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 7 sts finally make 1 half_double_crochet inv decrease 9 sts row 8 chain 1 turn make 1 half_double_crochet in each of the first 4 sts chain 2 skip 2 sts and then make 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 2 sts then make 2 half_double_crochet into the hole you made from the previous row finally make 1 half_double_crochet in the last st 9 sts row 9 chain 1 turn make 1 half_double_crochet in each
